name: SpotFinder
description: A search engine for parking spaces in the best shopping malls.
title: Find parking in large and busy shopping malls.
subtitle: Web and responsive design. Industrial Design

seo.title: Find parking in busy places - Comandos
seo.description: Discover how we created hardware and software from scratch to solve a big problem: Finding parking in a large baseball stadium.

sections.description: Spotfinder is an effort to control the availability of parking stalls in very large and crowded places such as shopping malls or stadiums. It had a hardware design to control the actual availability and a complete user experience design to find a spot, reserve it for FREE with an integration with google maps and augmented reality.

sections.title: Users find parking spaces from their phone

items.title: The challenge
items.description: In very busy and large sites it can take up to 1 hour to find a parking space, so why not reserve it for a limited time and guide you to the place?.
list: Up to 1 hour of time saved.
Integrate with google maps + augmented reality.
Remembers where your parked you car.

items.title: Defining the process
items.description: We had 2 stages. The first was to valdiate the idea in its minimum experession. The secord was to have a more complete MVP to go to market with an App to reserve space and then come back to get your car.

items.title: Customer journey
list: The basis of this project was electronics to know the availability. We relied on IoT to have an first MVP in 30 days.
We had up to 3 experiments to achieve the best registration process.

sections.description: A complete MVP with hardware design included in less than 6 monts.
sections.title: An outstanding result, all in one

comment.text: “It has been a roller coaster of feelings starting from scratch on everything and making progress including industrial design, electronics, stress testing, platform app. It’s amazing to work with Comandos.

items.title: Patented hardware
items.description: We unify entire experience of reserving parking spaces into a low-cost experience, optimizing internal routes within the establishment using augmented reality.

items.title: Exponential growth
list: We design 2 types of solutions according to the client’s approach.
We reduce by 70% the time to find parking spaces in big events in stadiums.
